Question
========

Suppose the height of Dutch men has a normal distribution with a mean of 175 centimeters and a standard deviation of 7.5 centimeters. Then what is the percentage that lies between 170 cm and 182.5 cm?

Answerlist
----------

* 25%
* 59%
* 75%
* 84%

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 25%: Incorrect
* 59%: Correct
* 75%: Incorrect
* 84%: Incorrect
